document_data.caption: The Dragon Reach around the 1370s DR.
document_data.name: Dragon Reach
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dragon Reach''' was a northwestern fjord of the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]] that stretched between [[the Vast]] and the [[Dalelands]].
document_data.History: The name likely derived from the days, circa {{Yearlink|-700}}, when [[elves]] ruled the forested western shore, [[orc]]s were teeming to the east, and [[dragon]]s laired about the [[Moonsea]] and held sway over the northern part of the Reach.

Geographical features.Rivers:
* [[River Lis]], known to [[elves]] as "Nuathlis" and to [[orc]]s as the "Blood River"
* [[Fire River]]
* [[River Vesper]]
* [[River Ashaba]]
